artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Publisher: Ōmiya Kyūjirō
catalogue_raissonne: Keyes, Courage and Silence (1982), no. 166.48; Iwakiri, Yoshitoshi (2014), p. 287.

description: standing man wearing black kimono with purple trim, with white flowers on sleeves, and black and white obi; man is offered food on a red tray by a small black baboon; cave setting
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Beauty and Bravory in the ‘Tales of the Water Margin’ (Biyū suikoden 美勇水滸伝)
title: Shindō Kojirō Nobuyuki
